resources.string:
Press the green button to start recording.

When the recording is done press the red button to stop recording.

The recorded files will be saved in the GuideMe folder.

The GuideMe collects the data from available sensors on Nexus 5 and saves them in to a readable file for research use.

 Developers

 Chamila Rathnayake

\t2. When the app is running, the back key is\n\t\t\t\tdisabled. But you can exit the app by \n\t\t\t pressing home button.

3. When the app is running, the back key is
				disabled.

 4. Tap the green button to start recording 
			 the sensor data.

 5. Lock the screen by pressing power 
			 button. Put the phone in the pocket. 
			 Try to keep the phone up-right inside 
			 pocket for better results.

 6. While recording green button turns to 
			 red. To finish capturing press red 
			 button.

 7. The recorded files are placed in a folder 
			 named GuideMeFiles. The files will be 
			 stored in a sub folder named with the 
			 recorded date.

 8. Recordings in a day would be in 
			 the same sub folder.

 9. If you connect the phone to a computer, 
			 you can access the files using windows 
			 explorer. Email the files to us when 
			 ready.

 10.On first use, please note the starting 
			 point. Email the locations with recorded 
			 data.
